meanings.definition: To release or relinquish a claim or interest in property
meanings.sent1: She decided to quitclaim her share of the land to her brother.
meanings.sent2: He is quitclaiming his rights to the house to avoid any future disputes.
meanings.sent3: After quitclaiming the property, she felt a sense of relief.
meanings.sent4: Quitclaiming the land was like lifting a weight off his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The act of quitclaiming made the property transfer smooth and hassle-free.

meanings.definition: The act of transferring one's interest in property to another party without making any warranties or guarantees
meanings.sent1: The quitclaiming of the estate was completed without any issues.
meanings.sent2: His quitclaiming of the property was a generous gesture towards his friend.
meanings.sent3: The quitclaiming process seemed straightforward and simple.
meanings.sent4: The quitclaiming of the land symbolized a fresh start for the new owner.
meanings.sent5: Her quitclaiming of the house was a selfless act of kindness towards her family.
